Salesforce Components - EmailService
Overview    Classes    Enums    Interfaces    Triggers    SObjects    Groups    Index




Class EmailService

public inherited sharing class EmailService

Contains messaging methods and subclasses used when sending emails.


Change History

  • 06/19/2021   Initial version.
  • 08/10/2021   Allows sending notification emails to custom recipients, without notifying default contacts.
  • 08/29/2024   EmailMessage.setHtmlBody(): Added method to set the HTML version of the email.
  • 08/30/2024   Use new field Template Id Type to set the email template using the template Id or the developer name. Methods addAddress(), addBccAddress(), addCcAddress(), and addToAddress() are overload to take a list of email addresses.

Group:
    Service Classes

Methods

public static EmailService.EmailMessageResult sendNotification(
  String notificationTag,
  Id recordId,
  Id accountId
)

Sends an email notification that is preconfigured in the custom metadata Email Notification Settings (developer name: EmailNotificationSettings__mdt). The notification is related to the provided record and account IDs. Account default contacts are copied on the email.

Parameters:
    notificationTag – Tag of the notification as specified in the field Email Notifications (developer name: AccountContactRelation.EmailNotifications__c).
Tag must match the developer name from the Email Notification Settings custom metadata.
    recordId – ID of the record that will be related to the email.
    accountId – ID of the account that will be used to send the notification to its contacts.

Returns:
    EmailMessageResult object detailing the result of the send transaction.

Example: 
EmailService.EmailMessageResult sendResult = EmailService.sendNotification('Service_BookingConfirmation', 'a0P1v00000J9z3IEAR', '0011v00000J9z3IEAR');

public static EmailService.EmailMessageResult sendNotification(
  String notificationTag,
  Id recordId,
  Id accountId,
  Boolean notifyDefaultContacts,
  Map<String, String> recipients
)

Sends an email notification that is preconfigured in the custom metadata Email Notification Settings (developer name: EmailNotificationSettings__mdt). The notification is related to the provided record and account IDs. A map of additional recipients can be provided.

Parameters:
    notificationTag – Tag of the notification as specified in the field Email Notifications (developer name: AccountContactRelation.EmailNotifications__c).
Tag must match the developer name from the Email Notification Settings custom metadata.
    recordId – ID of the record that will be related to the email.
    accountId – ID of the account that will be used to send the notification to its contacts.
    notifyDefaultContacts – True if the default account contacts should be notified.
    recipients – Map of additional recipients who will be copied. Each map element should contain the record id or email address and the recipient type, allowed values: [to, cc, bcc].

Returns:
    EmailMessageResult object detailing the result of the send transaction.

Example: 
Map<String,String> additionalRecipients = new Map<String, String>{cnt.Id => 'to', 'email@email.com' => 'bcc'};
EmailService.EmailMessageResult sendResult = EmailService.sendNotification('Service_BookingConfirmation', 'a0P1v00000J9z3IEAR', '0011v00000J9z3IEAR', true, additionalRecipients);
